sqlMap.insert:
INSERT /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-INSERT*/ INTO settlement_company_bill(settlement_company_id,bill_no,insurance_no,insurance_company_id,insurance_company_name,business_bill_id,appserial_period,customer_user_id,customer_user_name,insuance_person_id,insuance_person_name,premium_amount,rate,broker_amount,status,plan_pay_date,raw_add_time) VALUES (#settlementCompanyId#,#billNo#,#insuranceNo#,#insuranceCompanyId#,#insuranceCompanyName#,#businessBillId#,#appserialPeriod#,#customerUserId#,#customerUserName#,#insuancePersonId#,#insuancePersonName#,#premiumAmount#,#rate#,#brokerAmount#,#status#,#planPayDate#,#rawAddTime#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-UPDATE*/ settlement_company_bill set bill_no=#billNo#, insurance_no=#insuranceNo#, insurance_company_id=#insuranceCompanyId#, insurance_company_name=#insuranceCompanyName#, business_bill_id=#businessBillId#, appserial_period=#appserialPeriod#, customer_user_id=#customerUserId#, customer_user_name=#customerUserName#, insuance_person_id=#insuancePersonId#, insuance_person_name=#insuancePersonName#, premium_amount=#premiumAmount.cent#, rate=#rate#, broker_amount=#brokerAmount.cent#, status=#status#, plan_pay_date=#planPayDate# where (settlement_company_id = #settlementCompanyId#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-FIND-BY-ID*/ settlement_company_id, bill_no, insurance_no, insurance_company_id, insurance_company_name, business_bill_id, appserial_period, customer_user_id, customer_user_name, insuance_person_id, insuance_person_name, premium_amount, rate, broker_amount, status, plan_pay_date, raw_add_time, raw_update_time from settlement_company_bill where (settlement_company_id = #value#)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-FIND-BY-CONDITION*/ settlement_company_id ,bill_no ,insurance_no ,insurance_company_id ,insurance_company_name ,business_bill_id ,appserial_period,customer_user_id ,customer_user_name,insuance_person_id,insuance_person_name,premium_amount ,rate ,broker_amount ,status ,plan_pay_date ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM settlement_company_bill se where 1=1
se.insurance_no = #settlementCompanyBill.insuranceNo#
se.customer_user_name = #settlementCompanyBill.customerUserName#
se.status = #settlementCompanyBill.status#
se.insurance_company_id = #settlementCompanyBill.insuranceCompanyId#
$sortCol$
$sortOrder$
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

SELECT /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-FIND-BY-CONDITION-COUNT*/ count(*) FROM settlement_company_bill se where 1=1
se.insurance_no = #insuranceNo#
se.customer_user_name = #customerUserName#
se.status = #status#
se.insurance_company_id = #insuranceCompanyId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-UPDATE-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL*/ settlement_company_bill SET status = #status# WHERE settlement_company_id in ($settlementCompanyIds$)
sqlMap.select: SELECT /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-FIND-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILLS*/ settlement_company_id ,bill_no ,insurance_no ,insurance_company_id ,insurance_company_name ,business_bill_id,appserial_period,customer_user_id ,customer_user_name ,insuance_person_id,insuance_person_name,premium_amount ,rate ,broker_amount ,status ,plan_pay_date ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM settlement_company_bill WHERE settlement_company_id in ($settlementCompanyIds$)

SELECT /*MS-YRD-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL-FIND-SETTLEMENT-COMPANY-BILL*/ settlement_company_id ,bill_no ,insurance_no ,insurance_company_id ,insurance_company_name ,business_bill_id,appserial_period,customer_user_id ,customer_user_name ,insuance_person_id,insuance_person_name,premium_amount ,rate ,broker_amount ,status ,plan_pay_date ,raw_add_time ,raw_update_time FROM settlement_company_bill WHERE business_bill_id = #businessBillId# and appserial_period = #period#
